LenovoChassisProperties.description: These properties shall be refered in Lenovo Oem properties for chassis schema

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Device_ID.description: This property describes the device id for this BP.
Device_ID.longDescription: This property describes the device id for this BP, only used for BP.

Entity_ID.description: This property describes the entity id for this BP.
Entity_ID.longDescription: This property describes the entity id for this BP, only used for BP.

HasSwitchBoard.description: Represents if the system has switch borad device in IOT systems.
HasSwitchBoard.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent if the system has switch borad device in IOT systems.

LEDs.description: This object describes the LEDs of the system.
LEDs.longDescription: This is a reference to LED. This object shall contain properties which describes the LEDs for the current resource.

MainboardPartNubmer.description: Represents part number of the system's mainboard.
MainboardPartNubmer.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent part number of the system's mainboard.

POS_ID.description: This property describe the pos id for this BP.
POS_ID.longDescription: This property describes the pos id for this BP, only used for BP.

PRODUCT_ID.description: This property describes the product id for this BP.
PRODUCT_ID.longDescription: This property describes the product id for this BP, only used for BP.

ProductName.description: This property describes the product name.
ProductName.longDescription: This property describes the product name.

Sensors.description: This object describes the sensors of the system in general detail.
Sensors.longDescription: This is a reference to sensor. This object shall contain properties which describes the sensors for the current resource.

Slots.description: This is a reference to a collection of slots in the chassis.
Slots.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a collection of type LenovoSlotCollection.

VPD_ID.description: This property describes the vpd id for this BP.
VPD_ID.longDescription: This property describes the vpd id for this BP, only used for BP.

title: #LenovoChassis.v1_0_0
